title: Mercurius c≈ìlicus: or, a caveat to all people of the kingdome, that now have, or shall hereafter happen to reade the counterfeit, and most pernicious pamphlet written under the name of Navvorth: or, A new almanacke, and prognostication for the yeare of our Lord and Saviour Iesus Christ 1644. (Said in the title page thereof to be) printed at Oxford by His Majesties Command.
author: Wharton, George, Sir, 1617-1681.
publisher: Printed by J. Raworth [i.e. H. Hall], for John Partridge,
